name: Amol Mavuduru
bio:
Amol Mavuduru is a freshman majoring in Computer Science and minoring in 
			  Mathematics. He competed in 
			  mathematics competitions in high school, as well as
			  state, national, and scholastic chess tournaments since elementary school. He is interested in 
			  the application of AI to a wide variety of areas, such as the development of chess engines. In his 
			  free time, Amol can be found playing guitar, playing speed chess, or looking 
			  for a strange math or programming problem to solve.
